TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AsymmetricKeyExchangeDeformatter extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示所有非对称密钥交换反格式化程序均从中派生的基类。

span.span: Represents the base class from which all asymmetric key exchange deformatters derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 非对称密钥交换反格式化程序加密密钥交换数据。Asymmetric key exchange deformatters decrypt key exchange data. 密钥交换允许发件人创建机密信息，如随机数据，可用作一种对称加密算法中的键和使用加密来将其发送到的目标接收方。Key exchange allows a sender to create secret information, such as random data that can be used as a key in a symmetric encryption algorithm, and use encryption to send it to the intended recipient. > [!CAUTION] > 强烈建议你不尝试创建您自己的密钥交换方法从提供的基本功能，因为密钥交换，若要成功，必须谨慎地执行操作的许多详细信息。It is highly recommended that you not attempt to create your own key exchange method from the basic functionality provided, because many details of the operation must be performed carefully in order for the key exchange to be successful. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何扩展类。The following example demonstrates how to extend the class. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricKeyExchangeDeformatter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricKeyExchangeDeformatter/CS/contosodeformatter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricKeyExchangeDeformatter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricKeyExchangeDeformatter/VB/contosodeformatter.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法创建抽象类的实例。You cannot create an instance of an abstract class. 应用程序代码将创建派生类的新实例。Application code will create a new instance of a derived class. 使用的实现之前调用的实现建立密钥。Use an implementation of to establish the key before calling an implementation of .

Public MustOverride Function DecryptKeyExchange (rgb As Byte()) As Byte()

param.name: rgb
param.span: 其中隐藏了机密信息的密钥交换数据。

span.span: The key exchange data within which the secret information is hidden.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，从加密的密钥交换数据中提取机密信息。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, extracts secret information from the encrypted key exchange data.

returns.span: 从密钥交换数据派生的机密信息。

span.span: The secret information derived from the key exchange data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用此方法的实现之前，必须指定密钥。You must specify a key before calling an implementation of this method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法来创建指定的输入数据的加密密钥交换。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to create an encrypted key exchange for the specified input data. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取或设置非对称密钥交换的参数。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the parameters for the asymmetric key exchange.

value.span: 一个 XML 格式的字符串，它包含非对称密钥交换操作的参数。

span.span: A string in XML format containing the parameters of the asymmetric key exchange operation.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写属性，以禁止格式化程序参数的访问权限。The following code example demonstrates how to override the property to disallow access to the parameters of the formatter. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，设置要用于解密机密信息的私钥。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, sets the private key to use for decrypting the secret information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你必须设置一个项之前调用实现。You must set a key before calling a implementation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写设置加密操作的公钥。The following code example demonstrates how to override the to set the public key for encryption operations. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
